lejos.robotics.filter

Class MedianFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • lejos.robotics.filter.AbstractFilter
      • lejos.robotics.filter.SampleBuffer
        • lejos.robotics.filter.MedianFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SampleProvider

    public class MedianFilter
extends SampleBuffer
    This filter returns the median value found in the N most recent samples.
    The number of samples used is specified in the constructor of the filter.
